name: NIH Dark Mode (Low Contrast)
description: Simple style that changes color values to dark gray background with gray text. Low text to background contrast. Ideal for users with eyestrain or migraines. Feel free to edit and redistribute as you see fit. CC0.

user.name: Zenith
user.about: Just sharing styles she makes for sites that frequently blind her. Everything I make for Stylish is CC0 so feel free to take and tweek/re-upload as you need it. I can't take requests, sorry.
